content: a touch of tweed a magically stiff brim and a thin leather belt add to the sophistication of this versatile wardrobe staple while the tate is made entirely with single_crochet the wool blend yarn creates a gorgeous rustic bohemian texture skills you ll practice include meeting gauge step-by-step instructions within working in the round and reverse single_crochet detailed supply list with sources included in pattern this ad-free pdf is formatted with large type for easy printing or mobile viewing pattern includes written instructions photo tutorials and links to video tutorials--everything you need to whip up your next favorite hat if you like the tate rancher hat you ll definitely want to check out our pattern listing for the cleo fedora wide-brimmed sun hat here https //www etsy com/listing/804439612/crochet-pattern-fedora-crochet-hat-sun this pattern originally appeared on make & do crew skill level - intermediate sizing/measurements - women s small fits 21-22 head women s large fits 22 5-23 5 head see additional details in overall pattern notes to determine sizing downloading - this listing is for the tate rancher hat crochet pattern pdf only pattern pdf will be available for instant download upon payment copyright/making finished items - thank you for sharing my patterns and tutorials when you do it helps support the blog and my ability to create more patterns which by the way i seriously love to do so really i mean it thank you you may make items to sell with this pattern/tutorial in exchange i ask that you link back to makeanddocrew com do not use my photos as your own sales photos do not distribute my patterns/templates as your own permission is not granted for mass production or factory manufacturing of any kind return policy -
